name: GoJoe
description:
Joe comes from Mars and he has gone to adventure trip to discover the Earth. But he didn't know that the Earth is Dangerous place! Help him to get back and find his U.F.O!

I would be very proud of any type of donate. Thanks a lot!

It's a simple jumping game, sometimes it can be rage! x) So good for your mobile phone :)

Features:

- hard levels

-lot of traps

-rage, rage and rage

Controls:

-move left: "A"

-move right: "D"

-jump: "SPACE"

Thanks for support. You will help me to my next projects.

My instagram: bit.ly/1nI0Xgz
